text:
@RepAdamSchiff Where is all that evidence of Russian collusion you claimed to have seen? 
While Trump, Cotton and others were warning and working on Coronavirus, you were lying to the American people, wasting millions of tax payer dollars, and chasing a made up fantasy. Sit down and shut up.
